abstract: Hershey cuts its full-year revenue forecast for the third time, and announces plans to cut 300 jobs under new cost-cutting program; cites dramatic drop in Chinese revenue.
lead_paragraph: First-quarter sales in China were half what they were for the first quarter a year ago, and April and May sales there missed expectations, the company said.

headline.main: Hershey Trims Forecast and Plans to Cut 300 Jobs
